title: Harassed by 3 men, Class 12 girl kills self in Noida
text:
NOIDA: A 17-year-old girl committed suicide in her house in Chijarsi on Friday night after she was allegedly harassed repeatedly by three men who had also tried to kidnap her.
The girl, a Class XII student, had informed her parents that three youths — Raja, Rahul and Shivam, all in their early 20s — had been stalking her for the past month, police said.
The trio allegedly directed lewd comments at her and threatened her with dire consequences if she spoke to anyone about it. "The trio tried to kidnap her last week but she narrowly escaped," said a family member.
The girl wrote a note wishing to end her life a few days ago. When the family came to know about it, it filed a case at the Phase 3 police station and demanded action against the accused.
But police did not arrest the youths and on Friday, the girl hanged herself from a ceiling fan when her parents had gone outside.
A police officer said an FIR had been filed against the three two days ago. Anoop Singh, deputy superintendent of police, said, "We registered a case and raided the houses of the trio. The youths and their families were at large."
The Chijarsi chowki in-charge, Ehtesham Uddin, was suspended for dereliction of duty.
A case of abetment to suicide has been lodged against the youths.
